channel.title: 317 - stalls
channel.description: how do i make it so u need to be a sertain level to thieve from a stall and u get a sertain ammount of money?

item.title: 317 - stalls
item.dc:creator: @hell-boy hell-boy
item.description:
@hell-boy wrote:

[quote=“Owned_Pl0xs, post:2, topic:319120”] if(objectID == YOUROBJECTID) { if (playerLevel[17] < LEVELHERE) { sendMessage("You need LEVELHERE thieving to steal from this stall!"); return; } addItem(995, HOWMANYCOINSYOUWANTTHEMTOGET); sendMessage("You manage to steal some coins."); startAnimation(881, 0); }

BTW, there is no timer for this.[/quote]

lol were do i add this?

item.title: 317 - stalls
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“dutchly, post:3, topic:319120”]Code:
if(objectID == YOUROBJECTID) {
if (playerLevel[17] < LEVELHERE) {
sendMessage(“You need LEVELHERE thieving to steal from this stall!”);
return;
}
addItem(995, HOWMANYCOINSYOUWANTTHEMTOGET);
sendMessage(“You manage to steal some coins.”);
startAnimation(881, 0);
}

Simple As that Exactly as he said. Pretty Simple[/quote]

you just copyed it since you couldn’t be fucked to delete code:
